context: Netflix reached 200M subscribers during pandemic streaming surge. The company faced new competition from Disney+, HBO Max, and other media companies launching direct-to-consumer services.

competitors.name: Disney+
competitors.notes: Disney's streaming service launched Nov 2019, 87M subs by end of 2020

competitors.name: Amazon Prime Video
competitors.notes: Bundled with Prime, investing in originals

competitors.name: HBO Max
competitors.notes: WarnerMedia streaming with HBO content library

competitors.name: YouTube
competitors.notes: Free video competing for viewing time
